The Full Monty (2 disc SE) [1997]

Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them
on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.   

Starring: Robert Carlyle, Tom Wilkinson, Mark Addy
Director: Peter Cattaneo
